statements: DELETE FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE resolution_type = 'Collaborative' AND resolution_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE report_id = 10 AND resolution_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE id = 5 AND conflict_type = 'Political';
DELETE FROM analytics_reports WHERE report_name = 'Quarterly Report' OR report_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM resolution_history WHERE report_id IN (SELECT report_id FROM conflict_resolution_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM TrendPatterns WHERE pattern_name = 'High Priority';
